name: Hit Shot
description:
Hit Shot - Open Beta

Mouse only Control, no need for any pesky keyboard controls. 

It's time to clean up shop, the pesky mites are at it again and want to destroy you. Powered with your shooter perform sweeps with different weapon types.  Collide with the pellets on screen to launch a barrage of attacks at your enemies.  How long can you last in this arcade type shooter played;

Game will be in continued development as new weapons are being added. Feel free to donate to help with development of the game. Feel free to comment for ideas on weapon types.

Features:

  • Endless Gameplay
  • 4 different Types of Enemies
    • Wander
    • Dasher
    • Pulse
    • Saw - Not in Open Beta
  • 4 Different Weapon Types
    • Pistol
    • Shotgun
    • Rockets
    • Sword
  • Highscore Leaderboards
